title.en: I last went... / I first went...
title.es: I last went... / I first went... (Expresiones de tiempo)

description.en: Learn how to rephrase 'The last time I...' and 'The first time I...' using natural structures.
description.es: Aprende a reformular 'The last time I...' y 'The first time I...' usando estructuras naturales.

exercises.prompt: The last time I went there was three years ago.
exercises.solution: I last went there three years ago.

tip.en: For all verbs except auxiliaries: subject + last + verb (past simple). For auxiliary verbs including 'to be': subject + verb (past simple) + last.
tip.es: Para todos los verbos salvo auxiliares: sujeto + last + verbo (pasado simple). Para verbos auxiliares incluyendo 'to be': sujeto + verbo (pasado simple) + last.

exercises.prompt: The last time I ate squid was two months ago.
exercises.solution: I last ate squid two months ago.

tip.en: For all verbs except auxiliaries: subject + last + verb (past simple). For auxiliary verbs including 'to be': subject + verb (past simple) + last.
tip.es: Para todos los verbos salvo auxiliares: sujeto + last + verbo (pasado simple). Para verbos auxiliares incluyendo 'to be': sujeto + verbo (pasado simple) + last.
